issue.title: [Docs] Docker documentation builds fail since the source directory is mounted as readonly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4405](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4405). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```java

writing list of installed files to '../../build/python/record.txt'
/
+ pushd /arrow/cpp/apidoc
/arrow/cpp/apidoc /
+ doxygen
error: Failed to open temporary file /arrow/cpp/apidoc/doxygen_objdb_4898.tmp
The command "docker-compose run docs" exited with 1.
```

https://travis-ci.org/kszucs/crossbow/builds/485348071
